text: Ramiro Ruiz Medrano (born 3 June 1958) is a Spanish politician. Ramiro Ruiz is a member of the People's Party of Castile and León. Ramiro Ruiz has been a Member of Parliament from 1989 to 1993. Ramiro Ruiz was the Government Delegation in Castile and León, in office from 16 January 2012 to 10 April 2015. Ramiro Ruiz was president of the provincial council of valladolid from 1993 to 2011. Ramiro Ruiz became the president of the popular party of valladolid in 2009. ==Biography== Ramiro Ruiz was born in Renedo de Esgueva, Spain. Ramiro Ruiz earned a master of arts from the University of Valladolid. Ramiro Ruiz was professor of education general basic (EGB). Ramiro Ruiz was mayor of renedo de esgueva from 1983 to 1999. Ramiro Ruiz was elected senator in the V legislature and he also elected national deputy in the IV legislature. Ruiz was procurator and first vice-president of the Cortes of Castile and León from 2015 to 2019. == References == Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Spanish politicians Category:21st-century Spanish politicians Category:People's Party (Spain) politicians
title: Ramiro Ruiz Medrano
